testcase.name: Search git for react app and print the readme file's first 300 characters
testcase.system-out: Given user is on git search Page............................................passed When user enters 'react' in search box and hits enter.......................passed And user is on results page and clicks on advanced search link..............passed And user searches for repo in advanced search page..........................passed Then User should see only 1 repo result that reads 'mvoloskov/decider'......passed And user should be able to print first 300 characters of the readme.md file of the repository.passed
